quote.title: Reflections
quote.description: Words that inspire our love and celebration

quotes.text: Love doesn't mean gazing at each other, but looking together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
quotes.author: 1 Corinthians 13:4

quotes.text: In you, I've found what my soul was searching for, what my heart longed for, and what my dreams imagined.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Ruth Bell Graham

quotes.text: Where there is love, there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: True love doesn't have a happy ending, because true love never ends.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Growing in love means growing together, supporting each other every step of the way.
quotes.author: Anonymous
